description: The web is littered with opinionated CSS frameworks that can rapidly back you into a corner. Now pre-processors like Sass have opened the door for more flexible toolkits, and a thriving open-source community. You don’t need 3 million followers and your own clearfix to contribute — just a willingness to participate and learn. Together, we can build more flexible and powerful toolkits that respect our unique styles and constraints!

title: Sassy Toolkits
